constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 53 (Thursday, March 24, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KIND:
H.R. 7213.
=========================== NOTE ===========================
March 24, 2022, on p. H3864, middle column, the following
appeared: By Mr Kind: H.R. 7218.
The online Record has been corrected to read: By Mr Kind: H.R.
7213.
========================= END NOTE =========================
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H3864]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Equitable Community Access to Pharmacist Services Act
